sentences.sContent: One in four people worldwide are without adequate homes.
sentences.sCn: 世界上1/4的人没有足够的住房。

sentences.sContent: She is prepared to offer me an amount adequate to purchase another house.
sentences.sCn: 她准备好了给我一笔足以购买另一所房子的钱。

phrases.pCn: 胜任……的；对……是足够的；适合……的

remMethod.val: ad(表加强) + equ(平等) + ate(形容词后缀) → 比平等多的 → 足够的

trans.tranCn: 适当的； 足够的； 适当的， 胜任的
trans.tranOther: If something is adequate, there is enough of it or it is good enough to be used or accepted
